parts.text: Create a full shop website for my webapp, its low-key i want it to handla payments like this: in the cart user can choose payment method: insagram/discord ticket/telegram dm/crypto/paypal, if they choose crypto/paypal user: enters their contact info either instagram/discord/telegram/email and they enter the key they want they will access the webapp with, the key and contact gets sent to my webhook, the user is instructed to either name the payment with their access key on paypal or send a specified crypto amount(just add a placeholder value for now)

message.text: Create a full shop website for my webapp, its low-key i want it to handla payments like this: in the cart user can choose payment method: insagram/discord ticket/telegram dm/crypto/paypal, if they choose crypto/paypal user: enters their contact info either instagram/discord/telegram/email and they enter the key they want they will access the webapp with, the key and contact gets sent to my webhook, the user is instructed to either name the payment with their access key on paypal or send a specified crypto amount(just add a placeholder value for now)

edits.text: html, body { margin:0; padding:0; font-family: system-ui,-apple-system,"Segoe UI",Roboto,Ubuntu,sans-serif; background:#0f1115; color:#e5e7eb; }

header { display:flex; align-items:center; justify-content:space-between; gap:2rem; padding:1rem clamp(1rem,2vw,2rem); backdrop-filter: blur(14px); position:sticky; top:0; z-index:20; background:rgba(15,17,21,.85); border-bottom:1px solid var(--border); }

button, .btn { cursor:pointer; background:var(--accent); color:#fff; border:none; padding:.75rem 1rem; font:inherit; border-radius:var(--radius); display:inline-flex; align-items:center; gap:.5rem; font-weight:500; transition:.25s background, .25s box-shadow, .25s transform; text-decoration:none; }
.product { background:var(--bg-alt); padding:1rem; border:1px solid var(--border); border-radius:var(--radius); display:flex; flex-direction:column; gap:.75rem; position:relative; }

.badge { position:absolute; top:.75rem; right:.75rem; background:#111827; color:#f9fafb; padding:.35rem .55rem; font-size:.65rem; letter-spacing:1px; border-radius:999px; text-transform:uppercase; border:1px solid var(--border); }
.search-bar input { width:100%; background:#11151c; border:1px solid var(--border); padding:.7rem 1rem; border-radius: var(--radius); color:#fff; }
.category-filter button { background:#11151c; border:1px solid var(--border); color:#9ca3af; }
#cart-count { position:absolute; top:-6px; right:-6px; background:var(--danger); color:#fff; font-size:.65rem; padding:2px 6px; border-radius:999px; }

#cart-drawer { position:fixed; top:0; right:0; width: min(420px,100%); height:100%; background:#11151c; box-shadow:-4px 0 24px rgba(0,0,0,.4); transform: translateX(100%); transition:.4s cubic-bezier(.65,.05,.36,1); display:flex; flex-direction:column; z-index:50; border-left:1px solid var(--border); }
#cart-drawer header { position:static; background:none; backdrop-filter:none; border:none; padding:1rem 1.25rem; }
#cart-items { flex:1; overflow-y:auto; padding:0 1.25rem 1.25rem; display:flex; flex-direction:column; gap:.85rem; }
.cart-item { display:grid; grid-template-columns: 1fr auto; gap:.5rem 1rem; background:#1b222c; border:1px solid var(--border); border-radius:12px; padding:.75rem .85rem; }
.cart-footer { border-top:1px solid var(--border); padding:1rem 1.25rem 1.25rem; display:flex; flex-direction:column; gap:.85rem; background:#0f1318; }
.dialog-backdrop { position:fixed; inset:0; background:rgba(0,0,0,.55); display:none; align-items:center; justify-content:center; z-index:60; padding:1.25rem; }

.dialog { background:#11151c; width:min(560px,100%); max-height:90vh; overflow-y:auto; border:1px solid var(--border); border-radius:var(--radius); padding:1.25rem 1.35rem 1.75rem; display:flex; flex-direction:column; gap:1rem; }
.payment-methods button { flex:1 1 160px; background:#1c2531; border:1px solid var(--border); color:#d1d5db; }
.notice { background:#1e293b; padding:.65rem .75rem; border-left:4px solid var(--accent); border-radius:8px; font-size:.85rem; line-height:1.35; }
label { font-size:.75rem; text-transform:uppercase; letter-spacing:.75px; font-weight:600; display:block; margin-bottom:.35rem; color:#9ca3af; }
input[type=text], input[type=email] { width:100%; background:#0f1217; border:1px solid var(--border); padding:.65rem .75rem; border-radius:10px; color:#fff; }
.instructions { background:#1a2230; padding:.75rem .85rem; border:1px dashed var(--border); border-radius:10px; font-size:.8rem; line-height:1.4; }
footer { margin-top:3rem; padding:2rem 1rem; text-align:center; font-size:.7rem; color:#6b7280; }
html, body { margin:0; padding:0; font-family: system-ui,-apple-system,"Segoe UI",Roboto,Ubuntu,sans-serif; background:#0f1115; color:#e5e7eb; }

header { display:flex; align-items:center; justify-content:space-between; gap:2rem; padding:1rem clamp(1rem,2vw,2rem); backdrop-filter: blur(14px); position:sticky; top:0; z-index:20; background:rgba(15,17,21,.85); border-bottom:1px solid var(--border); }
header h1 { font-size:1.25rem; background:var(--grad); -webkit-background-clip:text; background-clip:text; color:transparent; }

button, .btn { cursor:pointer; background:var(--accent); color:#fff; border:none; padding:.75rem 1rem; font:inherit; border-radius:var(--radius); display:inline-flex; align-items:center; gap:.5rem; font-weight:500; transition:.25s background, .25s box-shadow, .25s transform; text-decoration:none; }
.product { background:var(--bg-alt); padding:1rem; border:1px solid var(--border); border-radius:var(--radius); display:flex; flex-direction:column; gap:.75rem; position:relative; }

.badge { position:absolute; top:.75rem; right:.75rem; background:#111827; color:#f9fafb; padding:.35rem .55rem; font-size:.65rem; letter-spacing:1px; border-radius:999px; text-transform:uppercase; border:1px solid var(--border); }
.search-bar input { width:100%; background:#11151c; border:1px solid var(--border); padding:.7rem 1rem; border-radius: var(--radius); color:#fff; }
.category-filter button { background:#11151c; border:1px solid var(--border); color:#9ca3af; }
#cart-count { position:absolute; top:-6px; right:-6px; background:var(--danger); color:#fff; font-size:.65rem; padding:2px 6px; border-radius:999px; }

#cart-drawer { position:fixed; top:0; right:0; width: min(420px,100%); height:100%; background:#11151c; box-shadow:-4px 0 24px rgba(0,0,0,.4); transform: translateX(100%); transition:.4s cubic-bezier(.65,.05,.36,1); display:flex; flex-direction:column; z-index:50; border-left:1px solid var(--border); }
#cart-drawer header { position:static; background:none; backdrop-filter:none; border:none; padding:1rem 1.25rem; }

.cart-item { display:grid; grid-template-columns: 1fr auto; gap:.5rem 1rem; background:#1b222c; border:1px solid var(--border); border-radius:12px; padding:.75rem .85rem; }
.cart-footer { border-top:1px solid var(--border); padding:1rem 1.25rem 1.25rem; display:flex; flex-direction:column; gap:.85rem; background:#0f1318; }
.dialog-backdrop { position:fixed; inset:0; background:rgba(0,0,0,.55); display:none; align-items:center; justify-content:center; z-index:60; padding:1.25rem; }

.dialog { background:#11151c; width:min(560px,100%); max-height:90vh; overflow-y:auto; border:1px solid var(--border); border-radius:var(--radius); padding:1.25rem 1.35rem 1.75rem; display:flex; flex-direction:column; gap:1rem; }
.payment-methods button { flex:1 1 160px; background:#1c2531; border:1px solid var(--border); color:#d1d5db; }
.notice { background:#1e293b; padding:.65rem .75rem; border-left:4px solid var(--accent); border-radius:8px; font-size:.85rem; line-height:1.35; }
label { font-size:.75rem; text-transform:uppercase; letter-spacing:.75px; font-weight:600; display:block; margin-bottom:.35rem; color:#9ca3af; }
input[type=text], input[type=email] { width:100%; background:#0f1217; border:1px solid var(--border); padding:.65rem .75rem; border-radius:10px; color:#fff; }
.instructions { background:#1a2230; padding:.75rem .85rem; border:1px dashed var(--border); border-radius:10px; font-size:.8rem; line-height:1.4; }
footer { margin-top:3rem; padding:2rem 1rem; text-align:center; font-size:.7rem; color:#6b7280; }

My WebApp Shop

Products

Your Cart

Subtotal$0.00
No automatic payment capture. Manual confirmation after you pay via selected method.

Checkout

This flow uses manual payment methods (DM / ticket / crypto / PayPal). After sending your payment, we will activate the access key you submit.

1. Choose Payment Method

2. Contact & Access Key

We will reach out here if clarification needed.
Will be tied to your purchase once payment confirmed.

3. Instructions

Select a payment method above to view specific instructions.

4. Submit Order Request

Fill details to generate summary.
This sends your cart, contact, access key & chosen payment method to our processing webhook.

Placeholder shop interface. Replace webhook URL & crypto amount before production.
